import axios from "axios"; import react,{ useEffect,useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import CasasPages from "./CasasPages" import "./CasaDetail.scss" import VolverCasas from "../components/VolverCasas"; const CasasDetail = () => { const urlCasasDetail = 'https://api.got.show/api/show/houses' const [CasasDetail, setCasasDetail] = useState ([]); let {id} = useParams(); useEffect (() => { const getCasasDetail = async () =>{ const res = await axios.get (urlCasasDetail+'/'+id) console.log('res') console.log(res) setCasasDetail(res.data[0]) } getCasasDetail() },[]) console.log('CasasDetail') console.log(CasasDetail) return (

{CasasDetail.name}

seat

{CasasDetail.seat}

allegiance

{CasasDetail.allegiance}

region

{CasasDetail.region}

religion

{CasasDetail.religion}

sigil

{CasasDetail.sigil}

words

{CasasDetail.words}
) } export default CasasDetail
